code: import*as constants from"../../../constants/questionsActionTypes.js";export var getQuestions=function getQuestions(){return{type:constants.GET_QUESTIONS};};export var getQuestionsById=function getQuestionsById(id){return{type:constants.GET_QUESTIONS_BY_ID,payload:id};};export var createQuestions=function createQuestions(questions){return{type:constants.CREATE_QUESTIONS,payload:questions};};export var updateQuestions=function updateQuestions(questions){return{type:constants.UPDATE_QUESTIONS,payload:questions};};export var deleteQuestions=function deleteQuestions(id){return{type:constants.DELETE_QUESTIONS,payload:id};};export var cleanUpQuesions=function cleanUpQuesions(){return{type:constants.CLEAN_UP_QUESTIONS};};
